item.description:
I am terribly sorry I am negecting my meetup group! It is the beginning of the school year and I have started a new job and my foster son is now living with me permanently...i have been very busy. I have a second now and it seems like a great time to have a meetup! Lets make it at the Seedling Cafe in Nashua. We had a really nice time the last time we were there and there have been quite a few new members that have joined and I would love to meet you all and get a chance to catch up!

Hope to see you there!


ruth.

ps. I do not know if you all know that there is a fee for having this meetup group...I do not want to charge you all for belonging to this group, but if you feel like throwing me a couple bucks that would be nice, if not that is nice too. I am glad the group is still here and hopefully we can make it something more. I would love to hear new things that are going on or ideas that people have for this group!
item.name: September Meetup
